name: Zayn & Myza My Hue PH Lip Tint
description: My Hue pH Lip Tint is especially crafted to give your lips a unique tint based on the pH of your lips. The transfer-proof lip tint is enriched with Argan Oil and Vitamin E that nourish your lips and give them a hint of sparkle. Its lightweight formula makes it perfect for everyday use. It is free from harmful chemicals and animal sourced ingredients like Lanolin, Carmine & Beeswax. And the best part, it is Halal Certified

name: Zayn & Myza Cleansing Makeup Remover Balm
description: A makeup cleansing balm that effortlessly melts away tough make-up leaving you with perfectly soft, soothed and clean skin. Infused with goodness of cocoa butter and vitamin E, the formula dissolves makeup and impurities while leaving your skin feeling hydrated.

name: Zayn & Myza Pollution Defense CC With SPF 30 Compact - Warm Beige
description: A POWER PACKED COMPACT Finally, a product that gives you just what you need and more in your compact. Enriched with SPF 30 P+++, this compact beautifully blends with your skin, thanks to a unique color-correcting formula. Not only that, it also has the first-ever anti-pollution formula that acts as a barrier and protects your skin. 100% Vegetarian and with No Chemical Nasties, this Halal Certified compact powder is perfect for everyday use! Zayn & Myza is a new-age brand that creates beauty and personal care products for the people of today. Made with sass, class and no-nonsense, the products reflect what we believe as conscious individuals of the world.

name: Zayn & Myza Vitamin C Face Serum
description:
• Product Type: Face Serum
  • Enjoy the freshness of 100x vitamin C with the goodness of Kakadu Plum in ZM Vitamin C Face Serum. 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, a derivative of vitamin C embellished with vitamin E, penetrates deep into skin, the serum brightens up your skin and visibly and improves the skin tone. It is crafted with brilliant Small Molecular structure that allows actives to penetrate the skin quicker and absorb better. 
  • The antioxidant rich, non-sticky formula naturally lightens dark spots and acne marks, leaving you with fresh and glowing skin that feels good inside out

name: Zayn & Myza Vitamin C Night Cream
description: ZM Vitamin C Night Cream is your perfect pick for overnight skin rejuvenation. It fights dullness overnight and wakes you up with bright and younger-looking skin. The cream is infused with goodness of Vitamin C that stimulates collagen production that brightens & tightens the skin. What’s works wonder is the active ingredient with small molecular weight of Vitamin C that allows it to penetrate deeper, and act faster on dull skin. Along with that it blanketed with Shea & Murumuru Butter that that that softens the skin and restore its moisture barrier. So, you wake up with brighter and healthier skin every day.

name: Zayn & Myza Vitamin C Foaming Face Wash
description: C off dirt and impurities in one wash with Vitamin C Foam Cleanser. The antioxidant rich face wash gently removes dirt without disturbing the natural oil-balance of your face. It is formulated with brilliant Small Molecular structure that allows actives to absorb quicker into the skin, minimize open pores, and repair acne breakouts. Pamper yourself with its built-in applicator brush that releases micro bubbles with Vitamin C that purifies the skin of impurities and gives fresh and bright skin on every wash. Not just that! Packed with the goodness of Aloe vera and Holi Basil, it keeps the skin hydrated, so it feels healthy and energized on every wash.

name: Tea Tree & Salicylic Acid Face Serum
description:
• Product Type: Face Serum
  • Calm down acne and blemishes with the power of Tea Tree Oil that fights acne-causing bacteria & redness. Paired with 2% Salicylic Acid (BHA), it effectively clears clogged pores, controlexcessive oil and soothes your skin delicately. 
  • Its brilliant Small Molecular structure allows actives to penetrate deep into the skin todirectly addressesthe root cause of acne prone skin. That’s not it! The touch of skin-loving ingredients like Niacinamide, Actipone and Thanaka Wood powderalso heals dark spotseffortlessly, making it a magic potion for healthy & naturally glowing skin.

description: The New ZM Breathable Nail Enamel is one of its kind breathable nail polish that is air & water vapor permeable. name: ZM STRAWBERRY TINTED LIP BALM
description: Time to smell some coffee. And apply it too! Say what? This non-greasy, lightweight, day cream with Arabica Coffee extracts moisturizes and energizes your skin. Paired with moisturizing Shea Butter and Vitamin E, it protects your skin from harmful free radicals and keeps it hydrated all day long.

name: Glow Glam - Glint & Glam - Blush + Highlighter
description:
• Long Wear Formula: Weightless, silky soft texture with deep color payoff allows you to wear your natural radiance & color for long.
  • Even Color Pay Off: Blends seamlessly with the skin that gives an even finish. Available in 4 beautiful shades for all skin tones.
  • Contains Argan Oil: Vitamin E & Argan Oil nourish your skin, so you can wear your shine worry-free.
  • Ultra-Luminous Radiance with Light-Reflecting Formula: Consists of micro-pearls that boost radiance and illuminate from within.
  • 100% Vegetarian: ZM Glint & Glam Blush + Highlighter is vegan and free from animal sourced ingredients, including lanolin, carmine and beeswax

name: ZM Blink It Kajal
description: Believe it or not, there’s a fine line between black and BlackestBlack. Rosehip oil enriched, this waterproof & smudge-proof kajal lasts 24-hour long to give you blackest black definition in a single stroke.

name: ZM Blink It Mascara
description:
• 24-hour Lasting: The smudge-proof buildable mascara is lightweight and comfortable to wear for long hours. It is also water-resistant, therefore keeps you stylish all day long.
  • Free from Chemical Nasties: The Blink it Mascara is free from harmful chemicals like Parabens, Paraffin, Alcohol, Gluten, TEA & Silicon, which makes it gentle on eyes.
  • Multifunctional: This 3-in-1 Volume, Length and Curl mascara gives lovely panoramic finish without any bleeding or flaking.
  • Intense Color Payoff: The clump-proof mascara delivers rich black matte finish in just a few strokes.Cruelty Free: We feel beauty is not worth anybody’s pain and suffering. That’s why ZM Blink It Mascara is not only friendly to your skin but also to our furry friends.
  • 100% Vegetarian: ZM Blink It Mascara is vegan and free from animal sourced ingredients, including lanolin, carmine and beeswax.

name: Cocoa Coffee Moisturizing Cream
description:
Time to smell some coffee. And apply it too! Say what? This non-greasy, lightweight, day cream with Arabica Coffee extracts moisturizes and energizes your skin at the same time. Paired with moisturizing Shea Butter and Vitamin E, it protects your skin from harmful free radicals and keeps it hydrated, all day long. Revive your skin with its antioxidant-rich formula and enjoy soft & supple skin, every day.

 

  • Non-Sticky & Lightweight
  • Moisturizing Shea Butter
  • Vitamin E Protects from Free Radicals
  • Arabica Coffee Extracts

description: Our Tea Tree Mattifying Lotion is a lightweight daytime moisturiser suitable for blemished skin. Infused with our organic pure tea tree oil, this easily absorbed lotion provides hydration, without clogging the pores or leaving skin feeling greasy. Use daily for matte, shine-free results. name: LAFZ NAIL POLISH  Apple Red
description: Crafted with your pious moments in mind, this halal-certified nail polish was made to brighten your everyday. Its water permeable formula enables water to seep through and touch your nails so you can perform you Wudu in good faith. Dermatologically tested with no animal-derived ingredients, this breathable nail polish will keep your nails supple and smooth. With a quick-drying and long-lasting formula, a single stroke is all it takes to give your nails a rich and glossy makeover

Dermatologically tested with no animal-derived ingredients, this breathable nail polish will keep your nails supple and smooth. With a quick-drying and long-lasting formula, a single stroke is all it takes to give your nails a rich and glossy makeover

name: LAFZ Body Spray Anahita
description: A quirky fragrance that appeals to the one who delights in the unusual, Lafz Anahita is mesmerising in its complexity. Its many layers of aroma are sure to cast a lingering spell. TOP: A pleasant suffusion of Grapefruit forms the top notes. HEART: The heart is composed of Black Pepper and Incense. BASE: Vanilla and Tonka Bean are the foundation of this remarkable creation.

description: Lafz Kismet evokes the finest sensibilities of a woman. A single whiff stirs up an enchanting image of lilies and daffodils that dot your path while you are serenaded by the music of dribbling waterfalls. The fragrance with lavender and powder notes summons the exotic and the ethereal.

name: LAFZ Body Spray Aqida
description: The Lafz range of body spray is a unique selection of fragrances that has been crafted with the finest natural oils to give you a rejuvenating aromatic experience. Our body sprays have zero alcohol and are enriched with natural oils, aloe vera and vetiver extracts that pamper your skin every time you use it. The aromas have different subtle notes that are long lasting and elevates your confidence instantly. The goodness doesn’t stop there, Lafz body sprays are animal cruelty free, CFC free,100% vegetarian and dermatologically tested. Just spray on and let your aura of purity linger on. Made in Turkey.

name: Golden Beige - Rose Serum Foundation
description: Pamper your skin with the skin-loving foundation that gives your skin an oil-free radiant look. With a medium to high coverage, this foundation instantly hides any imperfections and keeps you worry-free throughout the day. Rose Serum Formulated with rose serum and botanical essence, this foundation retains moisture to boost your skin’s hydration and gives it an instant glow. Weather-proof Formula Made to last through any season and any weather with a shine control formula, this foundation will keep your look oil-free and perfectly smooth. It is lightweight and easy on the skin, making it the perfect match for your daily use.

name: Golden Beige - Anti-Pollution CC Cream
description: Made to suit your busy life in the city. This lightweight CC Cream gives an instantly smooth look and combats pollution and protect your skin’s natural beauty. It’s non-sticky formula ensures a seamless finish that nourishes, mask imperfections, protects and evens out your skin tone. Marine Thermal Water Sourced directly from the French Isle of Nourmoutier, this Marine Thermal Water is the best anti-pollution compound found in nature. When it comes to stimulating your cells, rejuvenating skin and combating pollution on skin, Marine Thermal Water is your answer. Anti-Pollution Formula Enriched with antioxidants found in Marine Thermal Water, this lightweight and hydrating CC cream fights free radicals and decelerates the effect pollution has on your skin.

name: Aqua Sunscreen 50 ml
description: Made to give you the freedom under the sun, this SPF 50 lightweight formula gives an oil-free matte finish while protecting you from the harsh sun. With aloe vera and hyaluronic acid, not only will it keep your skin hydrated but will also provide a clear finish for a worry-free daily use.

name: Aqua Sunscreen 100 ml
description: Made to give you the freedom under the sun, this SPF 50 lightweight formula gives an oil-free matte finish while protecting you from the harsh sun. With aloe vera and hyaluronic acid, not only will it keep your skin hydrated but will also provide a clear finish for a worry-free daily use.

name: Lafz Intensive Shea Moisturizer
description: There is nothing more beautiful than feeling skin that is nourished with Lafz Intensive Shea Moisturizer. It has a beautiful creamy texture enriched with Shea Butter and Vitamin E that provides intense hydration and also locks in moisture, all day long! It covers fine lines and wrinkles, while being good for skin on the face and body. Use Lafz Intensive Shea Moisturizer as part of your daily skincare routine and let your skin glow with health!

name: Vera Pocket Deo
description: An ultra-feminine, fresh fragrance. Built around a bouquet of flowers, orange blossoms with whiff of heady hyacinth. Open the heart of the fragrance with intense floral notes comprising of Bulgarian Rose Petals, White Lily & Delicate Jasmine layered over comforting Amber & White Musk. A sprinkle of Sandalwood & powdery Blossoms with just a dash of mysterious incense make the aura of this fragrance.

name: CHERRY TINTED LIP BALM
description: Give your lips a touch of glamour as well as moisturization with Lafz Cherry Tinted Lip Balm. Enriched with Vitamin E and Cocoa Butter, this lip balm fills fine lines, moisturizes lips and protects them against sun damage with SPF 15. It is Halal Certified, contains No Harmful Chemicals and is also PABA-free.

name: COCOA BUTTER LIP BALM
description: Give your lips a touch of glamour as well as moisturization with Lafz Cherry Tinted Lip Balm. Enriched with Vitamin E and Cocoa Butter, this lip balm fills fine lines, moisturizes lips and protects them against sun damage with SPF 15. It is Halal Certified, contains No Harmful Chemicals and is also PABA-free.

name: Apple Cider Vinegar - Foaming Cleanser
description: Built-in Applicator Brush: This foaming face wash contains a built-in applicator brush with superior bristles that gently exfoliate skin and improves circulation while cleansing it deeply. Apple Cider Vinegar: Apple Cider Vinegar or ACV not only removes dirt, oil and other impurities but also contains AHA which helps to gently exfoliate your skin. ACV helps in increasing collagen production and maintain your skin’s natural oil balance. Aloe Vera: Aloe Vera is the perfect addition to this formula that helps in moisturizing and repairing your skin. By keeping your skin hydrated and smooth, it also helps in lightening blemishes and keeping it healthy from within.

name: Caffeine Foaming Face Wash
description: An energizing and rejuvenating face wash that is enriched with Arabica Coffee and Aloe Vera to give your skin the boost of freshness it needs. Arabica Coffee awakens your skin and clears it of oil and impurities, while Aloe Vera keeps your skin hydrated and healthy by repairing damage. The built-in applicator brush gently exfoliates and rejuvenates skin by getting rid of dead skin cells, keeping your skin fresh for the day!

name: Caffeine Face Mask
description: Lafz Caffeine Face Mask has a beautiful texture that helps soak the impurities in your skin from deep within and cleansing with the help of Kaolin. Enriched with Arabica Coffee, this face mask helps reduce acne, absorb excess oil and reduce inflammation while rejuvenating and energizing your skin. It also hydrates your skin with the help of Shea Butter that helps lock-in moisture.

name: Olive Oil Multi-Purpose Essence
description: Lafz Olive Oil Multi-Purpose Essence is a non-sticky, non-greasy oil that nourishes your skin, hair and scalp. It is lightweight and enriched with 12 nutritious oils such as such as Argan Oil, Shea Nut Oil, Cotton Seed Oil, Macadamia Oil, Green Tea Oil, Chamomile Oil, Aloe Oil, Calamus Oil, Myrrh Oil, Olive Oil, Cinnamon Oil, Soybean, Sunflower, Rapeseed, Almond, Jojoba, Sesame and Amla oil. It soothes and softens skin and hair while keeping it moisturized and healthy. With multiple uses, it also helps heal chapped lips instantly. Paraben Free and with No Harmful Chemicals, this olive oil is meant for all skin and hair types.

name: Hydra-Lock Face Serum - Squalene
description: An all-natural serum that is 100% Plant derived. This serum naturally seals in the moisture and significantly reduces trans epidermal water loss. Made with combination of plant-based Squalene (derived from olives) that makes your skin soft & supple. Light weight Oil Optimizes skin hydration Non-cosmedogenic Alcohol Free Plant Derived Halal 100% Vegan Suitable for all skin types Made in Italy

name: Luminous Skin Face Serum - Alpha Arbutin
description: Formulated to reduce the effects of UV exposure. Presenting a skin tone enhancer with safe skin lightening active- Alpha Arbutin. Gets easily absorbed in the skin and is also proven to reduce the degree of sun tanning- resulting in clear, radiant skin. Improves uneven skin tone Contains Hyaluronic Acid Gentle on skin Water based No Alcohol Halal 100% Vegan Suitable for all skin types Made in Italy

name: Skin Renewal Face Serum - Niacinamide
description: Now embrace the possibilities of clear, acne-free skin. Presenting a serum made with a powerful combination of Niacinamide and zinc, where Niacinamide helps reduce sebum production & Zinc relieves the redness caused by acne- leaving you with hydrated & happy skin. Improves skin texture Boosts skin barrier function Balances sebum activity Water based Halal 100% Vegan Suitable for all skin types Made in Italy

name: Black Seed Hair Serum
description: Lafz Black Seed Hair Serum is enriched with the goodness of Black Seed that strengthens and makes hair healthier. It also has Onion extracts that prevent dandruff, hair loss, greying of hair and gives it a beautiful shine. Now, your hair can get its daily dose of nourishment, for lasting, healthy hair.

name: Intense Care Hand Serum
description: Lafz Intense Care Hand Serum is enriched with Vitamin E, Almond Oil & Shea Butter that provides not only intense hydration but also heals and nourishes your hands. This intense care hand serum actively reduces skin conditions and helps in brightening skin with the help of Niacinamide for a healthy glow.Rich in D Panthenol, Soybean, Sunflower, Rapeseed, Olive, Jojoba, Sesame and Amla Oil, it effectively battles dehydration anddryness on your hands no matter the weather. Vitamin E: Vitamin E works on repairing and nourishing your skin while also protecting your skin with its antioxidant qualities. It reduces inflammation and helps keeps you hands healthier for longer. Shea Butter & Almond Oil: Shea Butter & Almond Oil provides intense hydration for your skin while locking in moisture and providing nourishment. Niacinamide: This Hand Serum contains Niacinamide that helps in brightening skin with a healthy glow.

name: Deep Medium - Rose Serum Creamy Concealer
description: Lafz Rose Serum Creamy Concealer is a comfortable creamy to matte formulation concealer, which beautifully mask imperfections, and has nourishing properties.

name: Light - Rose Serum Creamy Concealer
description: Lafz Rose Serum Creamy Concealer is a comfortable creamy to matte formulation concealer, which beautifully mask imperfections, and has nourishing properties.

name: Intense Black Dipliner
description: Define your beautiful eyes with the Intense Black Dipliner enriched with Ithmid. Ithmid has been praised for centuries by our ancestors for nourishing lashes and providing much needed protection for your eyes.This dipliner is waterproof matte finish and is equipped with an “easy to apply” felt tip applicator. It is long-lasting and stays on your eyelids without smudging or drying.

name: Refreshing Cucumber Primer
description: Want the perfect base for a flawless makeup? Lafz Refreshing Cucumber Primers a transparent, non-sticky primer with a matte finish. It is enriched with Cucumber extracts &Hyaluronic Acid which keeps your skin intensely hydrated while you ace the day!

name: Hydrating Rose Serum Primer
description: Want the perfect base for a flawless makeup? Lafz Refreshing Cucumber Primers a transparent, non-sticky primer with a matte finish. It is enriched with Cucumber extracts &Hyaluronic Acid which keeps your skin intensely hydrated while you ace the day!

name: Make Up Wipes
description: A hassle-free solution to gently remove your waterproof eyeliner, mascara, and kajal without any stinging sensation. Enriched with Vitamin E and Oats Extract, Lafz Makeup Remover was formulated to soothe your skin and keep its natural moisture balance. With no alcohol and no parabens, these Halal-Certified wipes will remove any impurities and keep your complexion clean with its natural goodness.

name: Pomace Olive Oil 150 ml
description: Olives or Zaitun (in Arabic) is known to be filled with nutritional and therapeutic properties. Take advantage of one of nature’s best oils with Lafz Pomace Olive Oil. Made from handpicked olives of a Spanish harvest, this oil is gentle on skin, while moisturizing and nourishing it from deep within. It has inherent Vitamins and minerals which nourish your skin even in cold climates. This Halal Certified, 100% Vegetarian oil has a Neutral pH, and can be used by everyone. It is also made for all types of skin.

Enriched with Arabica Coffee and Cocoa Bean Extracts, this face serum is perfect for gently exfoliating your skin, while providing the nourishment from deep within.
